onboardingInstructions: Follow the steps below to create your decentralized health identity.

setupStorage.title: Set up your health data storage on Web3.Storage

status.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
status.emailSent: Verification email sent! Please check your inbox and confirm to continue.
status.error: Error setting up Web3.Storage space. Please try again.

onboarding.connectWalletDescription: To begin, please connect a crypto wallet to your identity.

selectBlockchain.title: Create Your did:health
selectBlockchain.subtitle: Step 1: Choose a Blockchain
selectBlockchain.checkDid: Already registered? Click here to view your DID.

ethereum.name: Ethereum
ethereum.description: Use Ethereum or L2s like Base, Arbitrum, and Optimism

bitcoin.name: Bitcoin
bitcoin.description: Coming Soon: Register your DID using Bitcoin and Ordinals

solana.name: Solana
solana.description: Coming Soon: Create a DID on the fast and scalable Solana blockchain

cosmos.name: Cosmos
cosmos.description: Coming Soon: Use Cosmos chains like Osmosis, Juno, or Stargaze

didHealth.title: What is a did:health?
didHealth.subtitle: A did:health is a self-owned digital ID that links to your health data. It powers secure, decentralized health applications—like direct messaging and provider discovery—by identifying patients, practitioners, organizations, and devices in a trusted ecosystem.
